item.description:
NH 9-12 Liberty Picnic –
General John Stark Birthday Bash

Come and join us for a gathering of liberty-minded individuals on August 21, 2010. Relax and enjoy a casual celebration of the 9-12 movement and to honor New Hampshire hero, General John Stark. 9-12 members and other pro-liberty groups from around the region will gather and chat about the cause of liberty, share stories, and enjoy our shared freedoms.

Scheduled Speakers:

NH Representative and Defending Father Dan Itse

Constitutional Advocate, Educator and Defending Mother Dianne Gilbert (National Heritage Center for Constitutional Studies (NHCCS)

The Patriot Pastor, Pastor Garrett Lear

When: August 21, 2010 – Saturday

Time: 12pm – 4pm

Where: Guppey Park (Jenny Thompson Outdoor Pool) Portland Ave.

Dover, NH

Cost: Free (please RSVP – for headcount information)

Activities: Guest speakers, liberty trivia (with prizes), music, informational displays, pro-liberty merchandise, and a special announcement.

Important! All we are asking is that you bring family, and if possible donate any of the following items:

A package of hot dogs/ with buns , or a package of hamburgers/ with buns, and sides: dessert, bag of chips, salad, and BYOD - It is bring your own drinks (no alcohol please)

To RSVP, volunteer to help at the event, to let us know what food item you will be bringing (or any other information), please contact Jerry Delemus, Rochester (NH) 9-12 Organizer, e-mail: jerry_the_sensi@yahoo.com




“Live Free or Die; Death Is Not The Worst Of Evils” - General John
item.name: 912 Project Picnic
